overview:
Shervin has experience as a mining engineer in both consulting engineering and operational roles for base, precious and industrial metal projects. He has developed a credibility to interpret, evaluate and comment on the feasibility of mining projects either underground or open pit as a result of his combined financial modeling and mining engineering experience.

Shervin has performed many project evaluation studies, mine cost estimation, and due diligence for underground and open pit projects in a number of countries in North America, Europe, Asia, Africa and Australia.

Shervin is also responsible for the financial modeling at Tetra Tech and has completed a wide variety of financial evaluations for base, precious, and industrial commodities from due diligence to detailed engineering level. He has operational experience in underground mining operations at North American Tungsten.
